subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are bad on the road (8-12), at home (7-14), against teams with winning records (7-17), against teams with losing records (8-9) and when they wear orange (0-6).
snippet: The Knicks are bad on the road (8-12), at home (7-14), against teams with winning records (7-17), against teams with losing records (8-9) and when they wear orange (0-6).
